changes.title: Changed the Sprint-to-Fire Time from 170ms to 140ms.
Changed the Hit Flinch from 0.9 to 0.8.
OWC Marksman: Changed the Aiming Movement Speed from 2.41m/s to 2.69m/s.
ZLR Drifter A-08: Changed the Fire Interval from 82ms to 77.1ms.
.30 Russian Short 60 Round Drums: Changed the Bullet Speed from 855m/s to 765m/s.
.30 Russian Short 60 Round Drums: Changed the Aiming Movement Speed from 3.4m/s to 2.98m/s.
13.0''OSW Para: Changed the Fire Interval from 150ms to 139.5ms.
13.0''OSW Para: Changed the Headshot Damage Multiplier from 1.5 to 2.3.
Increased recoil recovery speed, reduced recovery delay.
Ranger Foregrip: Changed the Horizontal Recoil reduction from 3.7% to 16.0%.
30 Round 5.56mm Mag: Changed headshot damage multiplier from 1.1 to 1.6.
30 Round 5.56mm Mag: Changed chest damage multiplier from 1.1 to 1.3.
30 Round 5.56mm Mag: Changed arm damage multiplier from 1.1 to 1.2.
30 Round 5.56mm Mag: Changed stomach damage multiplier from 1.1 to 1.2.
60 Round 5.56mm Mag: Changed headshot damage multiplier from 1.1 to 1.4.
60 Round 5.56mm Mag: Changed chest damage multiplier from 1.1 to 1.2.
60 Round 5.56mm Mag: Changed arm damage multiplier from 1.1 to 1.2.
60 Round 5.56mm Mag: Changed stomach damage multiplier from 1.1 to 1.2.
Changed Upper Arm Damage Multiplier from 0.8 to 0.9.
Base Damage Range increased from 8-15 to 11-18.
Increased effective radius from 90 degrees to 180 degrees.
Disables scorestreaks using Havoc: Score increase from 25 to 50.
Havoc asssits: Score increase from 10 to 30.
Decreased the duraction of the enemy reveal from 15 seconds to 10 seconds.
Increased the radius in which enemies are revealed from 9m to 12m.
Increased the damage reduction percentage from 10% to 12%.
Slightly increased the bullet damage reduction.
Slightly decreased Energy required for activation.
Reduced camera shake while firing in ADS mode.
XRK Marksman Barrel: Movement speed debuff reduced: -8% to -4%.
30-Round Mag: Movement speed debuff reduced: -6% to -3%.
FSS Nightshade barrel: Damage range buff increased: +10% to +30%.
FSS Nightshade barrel: Horizontal recoil control buff increased: -6% to -9%.
FSS Nightshade barrel: Bullet speed buff increased: +15% to +25%.
500gr Slug: Damage range buff increased: +15% to +30%.
Points gained from energy kills decreased: 225 to 125.
Increased weapon switching speed (SMGs to Other Weapons).
Reduced switch-to-fire delay after switching back to the weapon.
Colossus Supressor: Reduced range boost from 40% to 30%.
Light Stock: Reduced strafe boost from 20% to 15%.
LEROY 438mm Rapid Barrel: Added -15% range penalty.
LEROY 438mm Rapid Barrel: Reduced stomach/leg multiplier by 0.1x.
7.62mm 30-R Mag: Increased range boost from 5% to 20%.
Agile Stock: Reduced strafe boost from 30% to 20%.
Airborne Elastic Wrap: Reduced flinch reduction from 35% to 20%.
Extended Light Barrel: Increased range boost from 15% to 25%.
Rapid Fire Barrel: Reduces chest multiplier by 0.1x.
Charge requirement increased energy consumption on kill.
Burst Fire Repeater: Added a +30% hip fire spread penalty.
Holger-26C Lightweight Mag: Added a -5% vertical recoil buff.
Holger-26C Lightweight Mag: Increased ADS time reduction from -30% to -44%.
Holger-26K Double-Stack Carbine Mag: Added a -12% vertical recoil buff.
Holger-26K Double-Stack Carbine Mag: Increased ADS time reduction from -28% to -36%.
Hip fire spread reduced from 275(200) to 250(100)
Hip fire spread reduced from 208(120) to 188(100).
Rapid Fire Barrel: Removed chest multiplier penalty.
Holger-26C Lightweight Mag: Added a -5% vertical recoil buff.
Holger-26C Lightweight Mag: Increased ADS time reduction from -30% to -44%.
Holger-26K Double-Stack Carbine Mag: Added a -12% vertical recoil buff.
Holger-26K Double-Stack Carbine Mag: Increased ADS time reduction from -28% to -36%.
Battle Royale: Hip fire spread reduced from 84(24) to 60(20).
12.4'' Cavalry Lancer: Added a +33% bullet speed buff.
Hip fire spread reduced from 84(24) to 50(15).
Increased amount carried upon spawning from 1 to 2.
Increased amount carried upon spawning from 1 to 2.
Agency Suppressor: Now reduces vertical recoil by 15%.
Increased upper arm multiplier from 1x to 1.2x.
Thunderbolt Sling: Increased horizontal recoil reduction from 5% to 15%.
Lower arm multiplier increased from 1x to 1.06x.
Improved Bullet Spread Accuracy from 20(15) to 18(10).
Improved Bullet Spread Accuracy from 24(16) to 20(16).
Hip fire spread reduced from 208(120) to 180(100).
CX-38E: Increased range and bullet speed buffs from 25% to 30%.
VDD Skeletal: Increased hip fire spread penalty from from 5% to 20%.
Choke: Increased Bullet Spread Accuracy buff from 10% to 18%.
Choke: Increased hip fire spread buff from 10% to 12%.
Choke: Reduced movement speed penalty 5% to 1%.
Choke: Added a -3% ADS movement speed penalty.
Choke: Added a +5% ADS time penalty.
Reduced throwable recovery time from 20s to 15s.
Increased Operator Skill charge speed buff from 30% to 40%.
Multiplayer: Range profile increased from 16m/26m/30m to 16m/30m/36m.
Lower arm multiplier increased from 1x to 1.1x.
Gunner Stock: Added a +10% range buff.
M67 Ammo: Increased upper arm multiplier to 1.3x.
Echo Fire Mod: Increased upper arm multiplier from 1x to 1.1x.
Increased lower arm multiplier from 1x to 1.1x.
Increased lower arm multiplier from 1x to 1.1x.
Extended Mag A: Increased mag size from 39 to 44.
Fast Reload: Increased reload time buff from -15% to -25%.
Increased chest and upper arm multipliers from 1x to 1.06x.
OWC Foregrip: Reduced ADS Time Penalty from 14% to 10%.
OWC Foregrip: Reduced ADS Movement Speed penalty from 9% to 5%.
OWC Foregrip: Reduced horizontal recoil reduction from -15.3% to -15.2%.
Increased movement speed debuff from 25% to 35%.
Increased chance of obtaining the destroyed scorestreak from 60% to 70%.
